about_the_game:
Presence is a Tile based Roguelike. Explore the world, fight in an engaging turn based combat system. and uncover the hidden truth behind Presence.

Engaging Combat System


A large portion of the game involves fighting enemies you come across. This is done in a tile based, and turn based combat system. As you explore it will seamlessly transition to combat. Decide what you want your characters to do: fight, move, use a powerful ability? Just remember, the enemies may have access to strong abilities as well.

Randomly Generated Levels


Every time you start the game a unique level is generated. This makes for a unique adventure every time you play, as every time new maps will appear that you haven't seen before.

Grow Your Party


As you explore you may come across friendly characters. Ask them to join you and expand your party. Who knows, they may even have secrets of their own for you to uncover.



As of now, Presence is in very early development. However, its creation has been going very well! Especially thanks to all of the kind support from all of you! If you wish to help this project, wishlist it here on Steam, and follow its development through the Discord and YouTube devlogs!
detailed_description:
Support The Project

Wishlist!

If anything here looks interesting or excites you, I would encourage you to Wishlist Presence. It is a no-strings-attached way to support the game. You help me and the game, and in return you will get notified when the game is ready for you to play.

Follow this Game's Development

If you are interested in following the game more closely, be sure to check out the YouTube Devlog series on my channel: Ace Infinity.

In addition, feel free to join the discord. I post updates about the games development and occasionally screenshots from what I am currently working on. Click the banner below to join.

short_description: Presence is a turn based, randomly generated, rogue-lite. Fight your way through enemies using a strategic combat system, gaining loot and power along the way. Use this to explore deeper, uncovering the dark secrets behind this bizarre false world.
